3 namespace Ubiquity\cache\system;
4 
5 use phpFastCache\CacheManager;
6 use phpFastCache\Core\Pool\ExtendedCacheItemPoolInterface;
7 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheFile;
8 
18 class PhpFastCacheDriver extends AbstractDataCache {
23  private $cacheInstance;
24 
28  public function __construct($root, $postfix = "", $cacheParams = []) {
29  parent::__construct ( $root, $postfix );
30  $cacheType = $cacheParams ['type'];
31  $defaultParams = [ 'defaultTtl' => 86400,'itemDetailedDate' => true ];
32  $cacheParams = \array_merge ( $cacheParams, $defaultParams );
33  $this->cacheInstance = CacheManager::getInstance ( $cacheType, $cacheParams );
34  }
35 
42  public function exists($key) {
43  return $this->cacheInstance->hasItem ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) );
44  }
45 
46  public function store($key, $code, $tag = null, $php = true) {
47  $this->storeContent ( $key, $code, $tag );
48  }
49 
57  protected function storeContent($key, $content, $tag) {
58  $key = $this->getRealKey ( $key );
59  $item = $this->cacheInstance->getItem ( $key );
60  $item->set ( $content );
61  $item->addTag ( $tag );
62  $this->cacheInstance->save ( $item );
63  }
64 
65  protected function getRealKey($key) {
66  $key = \str_replace ( "/", "-", $key );
67  return \str_replace ( "\\", "-", $key );
68  }
69 
76  public function fetch($key) {
77  $result = $this->cacheInstance->getItem ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) )->get ();
78  return eval ( $result );
79  }
80 
87  public function file_get_contents($key) {
88  return $this->cacheInstance->getItem ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) )->get ();
89  }
90 
97  public function getTimestamp($key) {
98  $key = $this->getRealKey ( $key );
99  return $this->cacheInstance->getItem ( $key )->getModificationDate ()->getTimestamp ();
100  }
101 
102  public function remove($key) {
103  $key = $this->getRealKey ( $key );
104  $this->cacheInstance->deleteItem ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) );
105  }
106 
107  public function clear() {
108  $this->cacheInstance->clear ();
109  }
110 
111  protected function getCacheEntries($type) {
112  return $this->cacheInstance->getItemsByTag ( $type );
113  }
114 
115  public function getCacheFiles($type) {
116  $result = [ ];
117  $entries = $this->getCacheEntries ( $type );
118 
119  foreach ( $entries as $entry ) {
120  $key = $entry->getKey ();
121  $result [] = new CacheFile ( \ucfirst ( $type ), $key, $entry->getCreationDate ()->getTimestamp (), "", $key );
122  }
123  if (\sizeof ( $result ) === 0)
124  $result [] = new CacheFile ( \ucfirst ( $type ), "", "", "" );
125  return $result;
126  }
127 
128  public function clearCache($type) {
129  $this->cacheInstance->deleteItemsByTag ( $type );
130  }
131 
132  public function getCacheInfo() {
133  return parent::getCacheInfo () . "<br>Driver name : <b>" . $this->cacheInstance->getDriverName () . "</b>";
134  }
135 
136  public function getEntryKey($key) {
137  return $this->cacheInstance->getItem ( $this->getRealKey ( $key ) )->getKey ();
138  }
139 }
